description: Source file defining theme-related constants, color palette, and a custom ThemeData for the Ocean Professional theme in a Flutter application.

classes.name: AppColors
classes.description: Contains color tokens used across the app, such as brand colors, surface, text, and border colors.

classes.name: Radii
classes.description: Defines standard border-radius constants for UI elements.

classes.name: Spacing
classes.description: Defines spacing scale constants used for layout and padding.

methods.name: oceanProfessionalTheme
methods.description: A Flutter ThemeData object that encapsulates color schemes, text styles, input styles, button styles, chip styles, tab bar styles, slider styles, card styles, and bottom sheet styles for the Ocean Professional theme.
